api_info.title: Current time
api_info.description: Identify the appropriate Timezone area and location for a given location and get time at that location

placeholders.validation_criteria: An example of area_location is: America/New_York or Europe/London. Based on the valid location provided, determine appropriate area_location.

api_info.title: Current weather
api_info.description: Get current weather information for a valid city or location.

placeholders.validation_criteria: A valid and recognizable City name without State or State Code. e.g. Columbus
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Categorical news headlines
api_info.description: Get news headlines for the given category and a valid country

placeholders.validation_criteria: A valid 2-letter Country Code for a valid and recognizable Country
Any one category amongst - business|general|health|science|technology. Default=general
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Historical stock prices
api_info.description: Get historical stock prices for a valid listed company over past number of days.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Stock Symbol for the speficied Company name
Number of days for which stock information must be retrieved
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Company information
api_info.description: Get profile about a valid company.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Stock Symbol for the speficied Company name
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Income statement or Profit and Loss financial statement
api_info.description: Get latest income statement which is a type of financial statement containing information such as revenue, COGS, SG&A, profit/loss, types of expenses, etc.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Stock Symbol for the speficied Company name
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Balance sheet financial statement
api_info.description: Get latest balance sheet statement which is a type of financial statement containing information such as assets, liabilities, taxes, receivables, retained earnings, etc.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Stock Symbol for the speficied Company name
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Cash flow financial statement
api_info.description: Get latest cash flow statement which is a type of financial statement containing information such as flow of cash from operations, investments and financing activities.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Stock Symbol for the speficied Company name
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Tesla chargers
api_info.description: Get Tesla charging locations at a given address. Information provided by National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL).

placeholders.validation_criteria: Address that may include a landmark, Street, City and State or Zip Code
radius within miles of a given address

api_info.title: Flight status by departure airports
api_info.description: Lookup flights and their status from a given departing airport

placeholders.validation_criteria: IATA airport code such as, CMH, for Columbus airport or Port Columbus International airport
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Flight status by arriving airports
api_info.description: Lookup flights and their status at a given arriving airport.

placeholders.validation_criteria: IATA airport code such as, CMH, for Columbus airport or Port Columbus International airport
Must use default value.

api_info.title: Flight status by flight number
api_info.description: Lookup flights and their status if a flight number is provide.

placeholders.validation_criteria: Flight number such as, UA123, for United flight number 123
Must use default value.
